00019 inline void lerp(double t, const double* start, const double* final, double* value)
00020 {
00021   *value = *start * (1 - t) + *final * t;
00022 }
00023 
00024 inline void lerp(double t, const color_type* start, const color_type* final, color_type* value)
00025 {
00026   lerp(t, &start->r, &final->r, &value->r);
00027   lerp(t, &start->g, &final->g, &value->g);
00028   lerp(t, &start->b, &final->b, &value->b);
00029 }
00030 
00031 inline int cast_color(double value)
00032 {
00033   assert(0.0 <= value && value <= 1.0);
00034   return int(255.0 * value + 0.5);
00035 }
00036 
00037 template <typename T>
00038 const T* lookup_color(double value, int num_levels, const float* level, \
00039   const T* color, T* temp)
00040 {
00041   if (_isnan(value))
00042   {
00043     return color+num_levels+2;
00044   }
00045   else if (value > level[num_levels-1])
00046   {
00047     return color+num_levels+1;
00048   }
00049   else if (value < level[0])
00050   {
00051     return color+num_levels;
00052   }
00053   num_levels = std::lower_bound(level, level + num_levels, value) - level;
00054   if (value == level[num_levels])
00055   {
00056     return color+num_levels;
00057   }
00058   lerp((value - level[num_levels-1]) / (level[num_levels] - level[num_levels-1]), \
00059     color+num_levels-1, color+num_levels, temp);
00060   return temp;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void psstream_impl::colorimage(double x0, double y0, double sx, double sy, \
00064   int num_levels, const float* level, const color_type* color, \
00065   int cx, int cy, const float* elev)
00066 {
00067   int k = 0, nn = cx * cy;
00068   double gx = cx / sx, gy = cy / sy;
00069   out << cx << ' ' << cy << " 8 [ " << gx << " 0 0 " << gy << ' ' 
00070     << -x0*gx << ' ' << -y0*gy << " ]\n{ currentfile " << 3*cx 
00071     << " string readhexstring pop } false 3 colorimage" 
00072     << std::hex << std::setfill('0');
00073   while (nn--)
00074   {
00075     color_type temp;
00076     const color_type* shade = lookup_color<color_type>(*elev++, num_levels, level, color, &temp);
00077     if (k++ % 40 == 0) out << '\n'; out << std::setw(2) << cast_color(shade->r);
00078     if (k++ % 40 == 0) out << '\n'; out << std::setw(2) << cast_color(shade->g);
00079     if (k++ % 40 == 0) out << '\n'; out << std::setw(2) << cast_color(shade->b);
00080   }
00081   out << std::setfill(' ') << std::dec << '\n';
00082   updatebb(x0, x0+sx, y0, y0+sy);
00083 }
00084 
00085 void psstream_impl::grayscaleimage(double x0, double y0, double sx, double sy, \
00086   int num_levels, const float* level, const double* color, \
00087   int cx, int cy, const float* elev)
00088 {
00089   int k = 0, nn = cx * cy;
00090   double gx = cx / sx, gy = cy / sy;
00091   out << cx << ' ' << cy << " 8 [ " << gx << " 0 0 " << gy << ' ' 
00092     << -x0*gx << ' ' << -y0*gy << " ]\n{ currentfile " << cx 
00093     << " string readhexstring pop } image" 
00094     << std::hex << std::setfill('0');
00095   while (nn--)
00096   {
00097     double temp;
00098     const double* shade = lookup_color<double>(*elev++, num_levels, level, color, &temp);
00099     if (k++ % 40 == 0) out << '\n'; out << std::setw(2) << cast_color(*shade);
00100   }
00101   out << std::setfill(' ') << std::dec << '\n';
00102   updatebb(x0, x0+sx, y0, y0+sy);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void psstream_impl::bilevelimage(double x0, double y0, double sx, double sy, \
00106   int cx, int cy, const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& pgn)
00107 {
00108   shape_type ss;
00109   // edge_shape(ver, pgn, &ss);
00110   make_shape_list(ver, pgn, &ss);
00111   bbox_shape_list(ver, &ss);
00112 
00113   int s = (cx + 7) / 8;
00114   int nc = s * cy;
00115   unsigned char *ch = new unsigned char [nc];
00116   std::fill_n(ch, nc, (unsigned char) 0xff);
00117   double gx = cx / sx, gy = cy / sy;
00118   for (int j = 0; j < cy; ++j)
00119   {
00120     for (int i = 0; i < cx; ++i)
00121     {
00122       double x = x0+(i+0.5)/gx, y = y0+(j+0.5)/gy;
00123       if (inside_shape(x, y, ss))
00124       {
00125         ch[s*j+i/8] &= ~(1 << (7-i%8));
00126       }
00127     }
00128   }
00129   out << cx << ' ' << cy << " 1 [ " << gx << " 0 0 " << gy << ' ' 
00130     << -x0*gx << ' ' << -y0*gy << "]\n{<" << std::hex << std::setfill('0');
00131   for (j = 0; j < nc; ++j)
00132   {
00133     if ((j%40) == 0) out << '\n';
00134     out << std::setw(2) << (int) ch[j];
00135   }
00136   out << std::setfill(' ') << std::dec << "\n>}\nimage\n";
00137   delete[] ch;
00138   updatebb(x0, x0+sx, y0, y0+sy);
00139 }
00140 
00141 void psstream_impl::grayscaleimage(double x0, double y0, double sx, double sy, \
00142   int cx, int cy, const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& pgn)
00143 {
00144   int nc = cx*cy;
00145   unsigned char *ch = new unsigned char[nc];
00146   double gx = cx / sx, gy = cy / sy, gg = gx * gy;
00147 
00148   int i, j, k = 0;
00149   vertex_type w(ver);
00150   const edge_type* org_y = &pgn;
00151   edge_type strip1, strip2, *pos_y = &strip1;
00152   for (j = 1; j < cy; ++j)
00153   {
00154     edge_type neg_y;
00155     sutherland_hodgman(0.0, 1.0, -(y0 + j / gy), w, *org_y, *pos_y, neg_y);
00156     const edge_type* org_x = &neg_y;
00157     edge_type strip3, strip4, *pos_x = &strip3;
00158     for (i = 1; i < cx; ++i)
00159     {
00160       edge_type neg_x;
00161       sutherland_hodgman(1.0, 0.0, -(x0 + i / gx), w, *org_x, *pos_x, neg_x);
00162       ch[k++] = (unsigned char) (0xff * (1.0 - edge_area(w, neg_x) * gg) + 0.5);
00163       org_x = pos_x;
00164       pos_x = (pos_x == &strip3? &strip4: &strip3);
00165     }
00166     ch[k++] = (unsigned char) (0xff * (1.0 - edge_area(w, *pos_x) * gg) + 0.5);
00167     org_y = pos_y;
00168     pos_y = (pos_y == &strip1? &strip2: &strip1);
00169   }
00170   {
00171     const edge_type* org_x = org_y;
00172     edge_type strip3, strip4, *pos_x = &strip3;
00173     for (i = 1; i < cx; ++i)
00174     {
00175       edge_type neg_x;
00176       sutherland_hodgman(1.0, 0.0, -(x0 + i / gx), w, *org_x, *pos_x, neg_x);
00177       ch[k++] = (unsigned char) (0xff * (1.0 - edge_area(w, neg_x) * gg) + 0.5);
00178       org_x = pos_x;
00179       pos_x = (pos_x == &strip3? &strip4: &strip3);
00180     }
00181     ch[k++] = (unsigned char) (0xff * (1.0 - edge_area(w, *pos_x) * gg) + 0.5);
00182   }
00183 
00184   out << cx << ' ' << cy << " 8 [ " << gx << " 0 0 " << gy << ' ' 
00185     << -x0*gx << ' ' << -y0*gy << " ]\n{ currentfile " << cx 
00186     << " string readhexstring pop } image" << std::hex << std::setfill('0');
00187   for (k = 0; k < nc; ++k)
00188   {
00189     if ((k%40) == 0) out << '\n';
00190     out << std::setw(2) << (int) ch[k];
00191   }
00192   out << std::setfill(' ') << std::dec << '\n';
00193   delete[] ch;
00194   updatebb(x0, x0+sx, y0, y0+sy);
00195 }

00224 
00226 
00227 void edge_clip(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, vertex_type& ver, edge_type& pgn)
00228 {
00229   edge_type pos, neg;
00230   sutherland_hodgman(0.0, 1.0, -y1, ver, pgn, pos, neg);
00231   sutherland_hodgman(-1.0, 0.0, x2, ver, pos, pgn, neg);
00232   sutherland_hodgman(0.0, -1.0, y2, ver, pgn, pos, neg);
00233   sutherland_hodgman(1.0, 0.0, -x1, ver, pos, pgn, neg);
00234 }
00235 
00236 // implementetion of subject 2.01 from graphics algorithms FAQ
00237 double edge_area(const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& ee)
00238 {
00239   double a = 0.0;
00240   for (edge_type::const_iterator e = ee.begin(); e != ee.end(); ++e)
00241   {
00242     const curve_type& cc = *e;
00243     curve_type::const_iterator prev = cc.begin(), curr = prev;
00244     while (++curr != cc.end())
00245     {
00246       curve_type::const_iterator next = curr;
00247       if (++next == cc.end())
00248         next = ++cc.begin();
00249       a += ver[*curr].xcoord * (ver[*next].ycoord - ver[*prev].ycoord);
00250       prev = curr;
00251     }
00252   }
00253   return (0.5 * a);
00254 }
00255 
00256 void edge_mask(const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& pgn, grid_type* g)
00257 {
00258   int cx = g->cx;
00259   int cy = g->cy;
00260   int nz = cx * cy;
00261   float *zz = new float[nz];
00262   double x0 = g->x1;
00263   double sx = g->x2 - x0;
00264   double y0 = g->y1;
00265   double sy = g->y2 - y0;
00266   double gx = cx / sx;
00267   double gy = cy / sy;
00268   double gg = gx * gy;
00269   g->z1 = 0.0f;
00270   g->z2 = 1.0f;
00271   g->zz = zz;
00272 
00273   int i, j;
00274   vertex_type w(ver);
00275   const edge_type* org_y = &pgn;
00276   edge_type strip1, strip2, *pos_y = &strip1;
00277   for (j = 1; j < cy; ++j)
00278   {
00279     edge_type neg_y;
00280     sutherland_hodgman(0.0, 1.0, -(y0 + j / gy), w, *org_y, *pos_y, neg_y);
00281     const edge_type* org_x = &neg_y;
00282     edge_type strip3, strip4, *pos_x = &strip3;
00283     for (i = 1; i < cx; ++i)
00284     {
00285       edge_type neg_x;
00286       sutherland_hodgman(1.0, 0.0, -(x0 + i / gx), w, *org_x, *pos_x, neg_x);
00287       *zz++ = float(edge_area(w, neg_x) * gg);
00288       org_x = pos_x;
00289       pos_x = (pos_x == &strip3? &strip4: &strip3);
00290     }
00291     *zz++ = float(edge_area(w, *pos_x) * gg);
00292     org_y = pos_y;
00293     pos_y = (pos_y == &strip1? &strip2: &strip1);
00294   }
00295   {
00296     const edge_type* org_x = org_y;
00297     edge_type strip3, strip4, *pos_x = &strip3;
00298     for (i = 1; i < cx; ++i)
00299     {
00300       edge_type neg_x;
00301       sutherland_hodgman(1.0, 0.0, -(x0 + i / gx), w, *org_x, *pos_x, neg_x);
00302       *zz++ = float(edge_area(w, neg_x) * gg);
00303       org_x = pos_x;
00304       pos_x = (pos_x == &strip3? &strip4: &strip3);
00305     }
00306     *zz = float(edge_area(w, *pos_x) * gg);
00307   }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void blankimage(const grid_type* g, int ilb, int iub, int jlb, int jub, \
00311   vertex_type& ver, edge_type& pgn)
00312 {
00313   int cx = g->cx;
00314   int cy = g->cy;
00315   int *nn = new int [2 * (cx+1)], *n1 = nn, *n2 = nn + (cx+1);
00316   std::fill(nn, nn+2*(cx+1), -1);
00317   for (int j = jlb; j <= jub; ++j)
00318   {
00319     for (int i = ilb; i <= iub; ++i)
00320     {
00321       int k = j*cx+i;
00322       if (!_isnan(g->zz[k]))
00323       {
00324         if (j == jlb || _isnan(g->zz[k-cx]))
00325         {
00326           if (n1[i] == -1)
00327           {
00328             n1[i] = ver.size();
00329             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00330             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00331             p->xcoord = i;
00332             p->ycoord = j;
00333           }
00334           if (n1[i+1] == -1)
00335           {
00336             n1[i+1] = ver.size();
00337             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00338             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00339             p->xcoord = i+1;
00340             p->ycoord = j;
00341           }
00342           pgn.push_back(curve_type());
00343           curve_type* cur = &pgn.back();
00344           cur->push_back(n1[i]);
00345           cur->push_back(n1[i+1]);
00346         }
00347         if (j == jub || _isnan(g->zz[k+cx]))
00348         {
00349           if (n2[i+1] == -1)
00350           {
00351             n2[i+1] = ver.size();
00352             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00353             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00354             p->xcoord = i+1;
00355             p->ycoord = j+1;
00356           }
00357           if (n2[i] == -1)
00358           {
00359             n2[i] = ver.size();
00360             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00361             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00362             p->xcoord = i;
00363             p->ycoord = j+1;
00364           }
00365           pgn.push_back(curve_type());
00366           curve_type* cur = &pgn.back();
00367           cur->push_back(n2[i+1]);
00368           cur->push_back(n2[i]);
00369         }
00370         if (i == ilb || _isnan(g->zz[k-1]))
00371         {
00372           if (n2[i] == -1)
00373           {
00374             n2[i] = ver.size();
00375             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00376             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00377             p->xcoord = i;
00378             p->ycoord = j+1;
00379           }
00380           if (n1[i] == -1)
00381           {
00382             n1[i] = ver.size();
00383             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00384             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00385             p->xcoord = i;
00386             p->ycoord = j;
00387           }
00388           pgn.push_back(curve_type());
00389           curve_type* cur = &pgn.back();
00390           cur->push_back(n2[i]);
00391           cur->push_back(n1[i]);
00392         }
00393         if (i == iub || _isnan(g->zz[k+1]))
00394         {
00395           if (n1[i+1] == -1)
00396           {
00397             n1[i+1] = ver.size();
00398             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00399             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00400             p->xcoord = i+1;
00401             p->ycoord = j;
00402           }
00403           if (n2[i+1] == -1)
00404           {
00405             n2[i+1] = ver.size();
00406             ver.push_back(coord_type());
00407             coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00408             p->xcoord = i+1;
00409             p->ycoord = j+1;
00410           }
00411           pgn.push_back(curve_type());
00412           curve_type* cur = &pgn.back();
00413           cur->push_back(n1[i+1]);
00414           cur->push_back(n2[i+1]);
00415         }
00416       }
00417     }
00418     std::swap(n1, n2);
00419     std::fill(n2, n2+cx+1, -1);
00420   }
00421   merge_curves(pgn);
00422   delete[] nn;
00423 }

00427 // noise type 2, flood land area
00428 void main()
00429 {
00430   psstream out("zz.ps");
00431   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A4, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00432 
00433   double x1 = 1388105.0, x2 = 1428355.0, dx = x2 - x1;
00434   double y1 = 706905.0, y2 = 784655.0, dy = y2 - y1;
00435   double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00436   double pg_height = out.pageheight();
00437   double pg_margin = 40.0;
00438   double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00439   double py = pg_height - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00440   double x0, y0, sx, sy;
00441   if (px * dy < py * dx)
00442   {
00443     x0 = pg_margin;
00444     sx = px;
00445     sy = px * dy / dx;
00446     y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00447   }
00448   else
00449   {
00450     y0 = pg_margin;
00451     sy = py;
00452     sx = py * dx / dy;
00453     x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);
00454   }
00455 
00456   clock_t t = clock();
00457   noise_type nod;
00458   vertex_type ver;
00459   edge_type pgn;
00460   noise_type *org[1] = { &nod };
00461   double ext1[1] = { 2.2 }, ext2[1] = { 6.667 };
00462 
00463   std::clog << "noise generation\n";
00464   make_noise(x1, y1, x2, y2, 750.0, 75.0, 10.0, 39.79, 5.0, ver, pgn, 1, org, ext1, ext2);
00465 
00466   std::clog << "coordinate conversion\n";
00467   convert(x0 - sx * x1 / dx, y0 - sy * y1 / dy, sx / dx, sy / dy, ver);
00468 
00469   std::clog << "clipping at image boundaries\n";
00470   edge_clip(x0, y0, x0+sx, y0+sy, ver, pgn);
00471 
00472   std::clog << "image output\n";
00473   out.newpage();
00474   out.setlinewidth(0);
00475   for (edge_type::iterator it = pgn.begin(); it != pgn.end(); ++it)
00476   {
00477     curve_type::iterator g = it->begin();
00478     coord_type* p = &ver[*g];
00479     out.moveto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00480     while (++g != it->end())
00481     {
00482       p = &ver[*g];
00483       out.lineto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00484     }
00485     out.stroke();
00486   }
00487   out.setgray(0);
00488   out.rectstroke(x0, y0, sx, sy);
00489 
00490   out.newpage();
00491   out.grayscaleimage(x0, y0, sx, sy, 350, 650, ver, pgn);
00492   out.setgray(0);
00493   out.rectstroke(x0, y0, sx, sy);
00494 
00495   out.newpage();
00496   out.bilevelimage(x0, y0, sx, sy, 350, 650, ver, pgn);
00497   out.setgray(0);
00498   out.rectstroke(x0, y0, sx, sy);
00499 
00500   std::clog << "done, " << double(clock() - t) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << " sec elapsed\n";
00501 }
